articles.title: Solheim Cup 2021: Matilda Castren claims winning point as Europe retain the trophy - BBC Sport
articles.description: Europe record just their second win on US soil to retain the Solheim Cup with a hard-fought 15-13 victory in Ohio.
articles.content:
Debutant Leona Maguire starred as Europe retained the Solheim Cup with a hard-fought 15-13 victory over the United States in Ohio.

articles.title: Solheim Cup: Leona Maguire says her week could not have been better as Europe retain the trophy - Sky Sports
articles.description: Leona Maguire completed a sensational Solheim Cup debut with an emphatic singles victory to set Europe on their way to retaining the trophy with a 15-13 success.
articles.content:
Leona Maguire says 'she couldn't have asked for a better week' after completing an unbeaten Solheim Cup debut for Europe with a 5&4 victory over Jennifer Kupcho
